statements: SELECT * FROM logging_encryption_keys;
SELECT id, encryption_key, security_protocol FROM logging_encryption_keys;
SELECT encryption_key, id, security_protocol FROM logging_encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE security_protocol = 'TLS';
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE id < 10;
SELECT id, encryption_key, security_protocol FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, encryption_key, security_protocol FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE security_protocol = 'AES' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE security_protocol = 'RSA' OR security_protocol = 'AES' ORDER BY encryption_key ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, encryption_key, security_protocol FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL AND id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC, encryption_key DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM logging_encryption_keys WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY encryption_key ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT protocol_id, protocol_name FROM security_protocols WHERE is_secure = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM security_protocols ORDER BY protocol_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 10;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_protocols WHERE is_secure = TRUE ORDER BY protocol_name ASC;
SELECT protocol_id, protocol_name FROM security_protocols WHERE protocol_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_version FROM security_protocols WHERE protocol_name = 'TLS';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_version FROM security_protocols ORDER BY protocol_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message, success FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (2, 5);
SELECT key_id, protocol_name, success FROM encryption_keys INNER JOIN security_protocols ON encryption_keys.key_id = security_protocols.protocol_id AND success = TRUE ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_version FROM security_protocols WHERE protocol_version = '1.0';
SELECT key_id, user_id FROM key_assignments WHERE assignment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_name ASC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_version FROM security_protocols WHERE protocol_version LIKE 'TLS%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(key_id) as total_keys FROM key_assignments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_keys DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'RSA';
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM communication_protocols ORDER BY protocol_version DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, encryption_algorithm FROM communication_protocols WHERE encryption_algorithm LIKE '%AES%';
SELECT user_id, access_level, access_timestamp FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 10;
SELECT key_name, key_type FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'AES';
SELECT protocol_name, encryption_algorithm FROM communication_protocols WHERE encryption_algorithm LIKE '%SHA%';
SELECT * FROM secure_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, access_level, access_timestamp FROM access_controls WHERE access_level IN ('Admin', 'Manager') ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
